title: 3 hurt in floor collapse in Savannah's 1899 US courthouse
description: Officials say three construction workers were injured when part of an upper floor collapsed inside the historic federal courthouse in Savannah, Georgia

title: Over 2,000 residents ordered to evacuate after fire ignites at recycling plant
description: More than 2,000 residents are under an evacuation order after a large fire broke out Tuesday afternoon at an Indiana recycling plant, officials said.

title: Mom files complaint, claims airline refused to accommodate son's peanut allergy
description: A New Jersey mom is speaking out after she claimed crewmembers on a United Airlines flight refused to accommodate her son's peanut allergy.

title: Pennsylvania man accused of killing his mother after drugging her tea with fentanyl
description: A Pennsylvania man accused of drugging his 72-year-old mother with fentanyl and fatally shooting her has been charged with her death, according to prosecutors.

title: Forbes '30 Under 30' honoree's charity accused of mistreating refugees
description: The charity founded by Safi Rauf, who's been celebrated for his humanitarian work evacuating refugees from Afghanistan, is being sued for fraud.

title: Jordan, Bragg feud escalates as Manhattan DA sues the GOP lawmaker
description: The exchange is the latest back-and-forth between Jordan and Bragg amid the historic indictment of Donald Trump.

title: Most leading Republicans remain quiet on abortion pill ruling as Dems blast decision
description: Many Republicans have remained mum on a Texas federal judge's controversial ruling against the abortion pill mifepristone

title: Jailed Russian opposition leader's health deteriorating: Spokesperson
description: The team of Russia's top opposition leader, Alexey Navalny, is a sounding the alarm that his health is seriously deteriorating in prison.

title: Workplaces are the most common mass shooting site, data shows
description: Monday's shooting in a Louisville bank is the latest workplace-related mass shooting to take place in the United States, according to gun violence data.

title: FBI warns against using public USB charging ports
description: FBI warns against using public charging stations

title: WATCH:  Dog walks on front legs to avoid touching the snow
description: The snow is lava!

title: WATCH:  Officer reunites with boy he saved from drowning in 2011
description: Twelve-year-old Matthew got to meet the man who saved his life.

title: Elizabeth Holmes' attempt to delay prison sentence denied by judge
description: Holmes is set to report to prison on April 27.

title: Suit: Chocolate factory ignored warning before deadly blast
description: A lawsuit over an explosion at a Pennsylvania chocolate factory says the candy-maker ignored warnings of a gas leak, The lawsuit was filed by the family of one of seven workers killed last month

title: Theranos' Elizabeth Holmes loses bid to stay out of prison
description: Disgraced Theranos CEO Elizabeth Holmes has been rebuffed in her attempt to stay out of federal prison while she appeals her conviction for the fraud she committed while overseeing a blood-testing scam that exposed Silicon Valley’s dark side

title: Chicago to host 2024 Democratic National Convention
description: The Democratic National Committee announced on Tuesday Chicago will host the 2024 Democratic National Convention at the United Center from August 19 to 22.

title: Florida fight over 'baby boxes' part of bigger culture war
description: A fight is developing in Florida's legislature over a measure that would allow fire stations and hospitals to install boxes where distressed mothers could leave their unwanted newborns

title: Virginia Rep. Jennifer Wexton reveals Parkinson's diagnosis
description: Democratic Rep. Jennifer Wexton of Virginia says she has been diagnosed with Parkinson’s disease

title: Tupperware, in dire straits, seeks financing to stay afloat
description: Tupperware Brands, which experienced a resurgence during the pandemic, is now pursuing investors to keep it afloat and is in danger of being delisted by the New York Stock Exchange

title: Biden administration seeks input on AI safety measures
description: President Joe Biden’s administration wants stronger measures to test the safety of artificial intelligence tools such as ChatGPT before they are publicly released, though it hasn’t decided if the government will have a role in doing the vetting

title: Instant summer: Record-high temperatures hitting Southwest to East Coast this week
description: Summer-like heat is moving across the country this week with dozens of record-high temperatures possible from Arizona to Massachusetts.

title: French building collapse death toll rises to 6; 2 missing
description: A French prosecutor says investigators are treating the deaths of at least six people who were killed when a building collapsed in the city of Marseille as a possible “involuntary homicide” case

title: What you need to know about the leaked US secret documents
description: It could be the worst U.S. intelligence breach in years.

title: Pirates board Chinese-run ship in Gulf of Guinea
description: A risk management company says pirates have boarded a Chinese-run oil tanker in West Africa’s Gulf of Guinea

title: WATCH:  Mets make remarkable plays to win against Padres
description: ABC News’ Will Reeve breaks down the bunts that led the New York Mets to a 5-0 victory over the San Diego Padres.

title: Researchers say their prevention program could reduce gun violence deaths in children
description: Their research suggests that prevention programs focusing on parent training and after-school programs could reduce youth gun carrying by nearly 30% over one year.

title: White House unveils initiative to target fentanyl supply chain
description: The White House will announce on Tuesday a coordinated international effort to disrupt the supply chain of fentanyl and other illicit synthetic drugs.

title: Survey estimates 1 in 5 adults say they've been threatened with a gun at some point
description: About 1 in 5 adults say they’ve been threatened with a gun at some point in their life according to a new survey by the Kaiser Family Foundation.

title: Macron visits Netherlands after Taiwan comments make waves
description: French President Emmanuel Macron is set to begin a two-day state visit to the Netherlands and is outlining his vision for the future of Europe at a speech in The Hague, after making waves with comments about the continent’s relationship with Taiwan

title: Taiwan's Tsai says China not being 'responsible' with drills
description: Taiwan’s President Tsai Ing-wen has condemned China’s military drills in the Taiwan Strait, saying China did not demonstrate the “responsible” behavior of a major Asian nation

title: Polish leader heads to US to further strengthen defense ties
description: Poland’s prime minister has flown to the United States for meetings aimed at strengthening the economic and defense cooperation of the two nations

title: Asian shares mostly higher after mixed day on Wall Street
description: Stocks are mostly higher in Asia after a mixed session on Wall Street

title: North Korean leader vows 'offensive' nuclear expansion
description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has vowed to enhance his nuclear arsenal in “practical and offensive” ways

title: US, Philippines hold largest war drills near disputed waters
description: The United States and the Philippines are launching their largest combat exercises in decades that will involve live-fire drills, including a boat-sinking rocket assault in waters across the South China Sea and the Taiwan Strait that will likely inflam...

title: Biden ends COVID national emergency after Congress acts
description: The U.S. national emergency to respond to the COVID-19 pandemic has ended

title: Democratic senators urge chief justice to probe Thomas trips
description: Senate Democrats are calling on U.S. Supreme Court Chief Justice John Roberts to open an investigation into the undisclosed acceptance of luxury trips taken by Justice Clarence Thomas and his wife that were paid for by a Republican megadonor

title: Minnesota college student charged after cache found in dorm
description: A student at a private southeastern Minnesota college has been charged with multiple counts after authorities say they found empty ammunition and magazine boxes, knives, propane canisters and other items in his dorm room

title: WATCH:  Alligator cools off in Florida swimming pool
description: An 8-foot gator was spotted cooling off in a Florida swimming pool before authorities arrived to relocate the reptile.

title: What we know about the Louisville shooting suspect
description: The alleged gunman who opened fire at a Louisville bank had been working there for years, according to sources.

title: 'Blood is on me!': Bank employees describe deadly Louisville shooting
description: Tragedy overtook a Monday morning in downtown Louisville, after a shooter opened fire on bank employees and responding police officers, killing four and injuring nine.
